column4: is dealing with external USBs that complicated or that silly? i have been trying for a long time and no one has any idea
it used to automount on Breezy but does not on Dapper anymore
logically it shud. But i dont see it
on Breezy it used to be on sda1
but on dapper it does not show up anywhere
tail -f /var/log/messages   - then plug it in & see what log is spat out
i get Jul  2 11:33:11 localhost kernel: [17184983.864000]  usb 4-3: new high speed USB device using ehci_hcd and address 19
in a perfect world, you'd get something like "Initializing USB Mass Storage driver..."
so is there anything i can do
that's it? just the one line & nothing more?
Jul  2 11:40:28 localhost kernel: [17185421.336000]  usb 4-3: new high speed USB device using ehci_hcd and address 123
does that mean I am screwed.. or that there is still an option? what gets me is.. it used awesome on Breezy
google is your friend - what's the drive make/model?
